name: Mathematical Word Problems
description: This task involves presenting the model with mathematical word problems to assess its ability to interpret, set up, and solve real-world scenarios using mathematical concepts.

examples.input: Sarah has 24 cookies. She wants to distribute them equally among 6 friends. How many cookies will each friend receive?
examples.output:
Each friend will receive 4 cookies.
Calculation:
24 cookies ÷ 6 friends = 4 cookies per friend

examples.input: A train travels at a speed of 60 miles per hour. How far will it travel in 2.5 hours?
examples.output:
The train will travel 150 miles.
Calculation:
Distance = Speed × Time
Distance = 60 miles/hour × 2.5 hours = 150 miles
